attributes.action: Disgraceful Disrespectfully action towards our Fallen Heroes
attributes.additional_details:
We THE PEOPLE believe that Parliament has shown a total Disgraceful Disrespect towards OUR FALLEN HEROES.. By changing the way our FALLEN HEREOS will be repatriated IN FUTURE..
Wotten Bassett should remain as the focal point in the process. As it does allow an opportunity for people of this country to pay there respect. It also ensures that these Brave Men and Women's sacrifice is not easily forgotten.
